{@Pārtha@}<sup>5</sup>¦ (do.) = Yudhiṣṭhira: I, 5038, 6254, 7619 ({%Y°%}),
8060; II, 189, 194, 223, 286, 291, 311, 345, 350, 513, 547,
554, 555, 655, 1596, 1684 ({%yajñaṃ P°sya%}), 1931, †1999,
2011, 2037, 2078, †2384, 2491 ({%Y°%}), 2496, 2507, 2513;
III, 40, 145, †918, †953, †961, 969, 972, 1026, 1127, 1128,
1156, 1202, 1218, 1315, 1319, 1400, 1402, 1403, 8259, 8381,
†10244, 10410, 10828, 10832, †10836, 11445, 11633, 11634,
11637, 11638, 11641, 11645, 11652, 11781, 11806, 11826,
11880, †12571(?), †12575, 12769, 12834, 13371, 13441,
14374, 15729, 16431, 16456, 16472, 16883, 16885, 17327;

160, 199, †713, †767, †771, †778, †788, †791, †854, †948
({%Ajātaśatruṃ%}), 1974, 2138, 2238, 2316, 2669, 4278, 4706(?),
4716, 5548, 5893; VI, 14, 765 ({%Y°%}), 1567, 2057, 2069,
2072, 3281, 3701, 3806; VII, 823, 1053, 1773, 4169, 4275,
5149, 5151 ({%Y°%}), 5464 (?), 5467, 6962 ({%Droṇa-P°au%}), 7261,
7267, 7383, 7388, 8737; VIII, 345, 2344, 2348, 2349, 2357,
2689, 2977, 2992, 3183, †3380, †3490, 3690, 5008; IX, 71,
246 (? {%°hite rataḥ%}, sc. Kṛṣṇa), 358, 640, 647, 854, †875, †882,
